CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Phone), "", /* CLEAN = digits with punctuation removed */ IF( LEN( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Phone,"(",""),")",""), "-",""), " ",""), ".",""), "+",""), "x",""), "X","") ) = 10, /* If 10 digits, add leading 1 */ "1" & SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Phone,"(",""),")",""), "-",""), " ",""), ".",""), "+",""), "x",""), "X",""), /* Else keep as-is */ SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Phone,"(",""),")",""), "-",""), " ",""), ".",""), "+",""), "x",""), "X","") ) )
CustomField.label: Phone Digits
